headline: Got $5,000? 3 Tech Stocks to Buy and Hold for the Long Term
summary: My picks for stocks that will be just fine three to five years from now are Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN), Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META), and The Trade Desk (NASDAQ: TTD).  Amazon is one that many have keyed in on, and it could be wrecked by tariffs.  It doesn't take much searching on Amazon's website to find that a considerable number of its products are made in China.
